name: Namco Universal Model Binary
summary: Learn about .NUMDLB files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Most Super Smash Bros. Ultimate players will never encounter a NUMDLB file. However, some modders extract and edit NUMDLB files to alter characters' in-game appearances. While other Bandai Namco video games use NUMDLB files to store 3D models, those games' players do not typically extract and edit NUMDLB files. So, if you have encountered an NUMDLB file, it likely originated from Super Smash Bros. Ultimate.

instructions: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate modders can open NUMDLB files in Blender (cross-platform) with the io_scene_numdlb add-on installed. Modders can also open NUMDLB files and convert them to and from other 3D model formats, such as .DAE and .FBX, with StudioSB (Windows).

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
